attributes.action: ensure that North Somerset District police is allocated with more funding to ensure that more police and police community support officers can be employed to make the streets of Weston-super-Mare safer. Therefore, It is essential that the Prime Minster supports a funding formula that fairly works out the allocation of funding for forces and ensures that Avon and Somerset Police is not short changed by £23 million pounds in the future as it has been in the past two years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Weston-super-Mare there have recently been an appalling number of violent crimes that have included a drunken man being kicked to death, an accusation of the gang rape of a woman and the serious assault of man who simply asked a group of youths to stop urinating against his wall. There is an essential need for more police in Weston-super-Mare, especially during the weekend in the town. We need a fairer funding settlement from the government to ensure we have more police to deal with these problems.
